overview: A TLAgay.com NATIONAL EXCLUSIVE made just for us! Get up close and personal with Ettore Tosi, named "the blue-eyed sex beast" by the Adam Gay Directory. Embark on Ettore's journey from his first solo to his quick rise to stardom in this anthology that features fifteen men over the course of eleven scenes and exclusive bonus content. This chiseled Italian with a smile to melt your heart has always been a fan favorite; this great introduction to director Lucas Kazan's gorgeous, award-winning catalog of titles will show you why.
title: Ettore: The Italian Stallion
